title: Gartnerei
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, European, Swiss, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Specialty is soups and salads, of which two on menu are vegan, or you can create your own or order one from the menu and tell the staff to leave out the non-vegan ingredients. For breakfast you can order muesli (lactose-free yogurt available) with fresh fruits, nuts, goji berries and vegan granola. Uses fair trade and is eco friendly and compostable. As of August 2014, has one other branch that is located in Zurich.
